participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Analytical and dedicated, Michael is focused on his career and family.
participant_1.background: i see the rolling stones in concert every year. i'm an economics major. i'm married with two kids. i eat a raw diet.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Dreamy and ambitious, Emily is passionate about her goals and has a strong connection to her roots.
participant_2.background: my family has raised horses for generations. i dream of moving to the city. i'm from a small town. i was raised on a horse farm. i want to be a lawyer.

content.text: i am a little tired from work
